(UNITURN mérőállomás)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_kartyalovaso_rogzito.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.20
safebottom0.20
overcut0.600

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.02

fmax900
fmin700
fratio0.8

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025 #furatok
c2 = 0.050 #letörések
c3 = 0.100 #keret

x1 = 7
x2 = 39

h1 = 8.5 # a bevágás hossza

x1 = sub($x1, .6)
x2 = add($x2, .6)

gw = 0.3
gh = 0.7

(1)
l $x1,0 $x1,$h1 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,0 $x2,$h1 z$z1 c$c2

#l 16,6 30,6 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 0,0 size46,12 z$z1 c$c3 g1,$gw,$gh r0 nl1,1,1,1

(2)
offset0,14,0

l $x1,0 $x1,$h1 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,0 $x2,$h1 z$z1 c$c2

#l 16,6 30,6 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 0,0 size46,12 z$z1 c$c3 g1,$gw,$gh r0 nl1,1,1,0
